title: How to buy steam games without using wallet funds - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to buy a game on steam WITHOUT using my steam wallet funds. Is there ANY POSSIBLE WAY to do this? Yes, I have done so multiple times. There was a steam discussion (How to NOT use steam wallet funds?) that said that you have to click some “change” button to not use the steam wallet. BUT THERE IS NO FUCKING CHANGE BUTTON!!!!!!!!!! That discussion is correctThe option to change the payment method is available during the last stage of check-out when you are making the final purchase confirmation.It’s a link, not a button. If you were looking for a button, you might have missed it: screenshot
Put the game/s in the basket then checkout where it says PAYMENT METHOD click the box under that and then select credit/debit PayPal or what ever you use.
